comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: This one, from the time of his 1933 suicide attempt, looks like the man in the photo above: newspaperarchive.com/waterloo-daily-courier/1933-05-21/ Here's his Wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joseph_Wright_Harriman
